entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
